headerDisplay: Make sure to give set the right IP address for the HUB
footerDisplay: See [homebridge-comelit-hub](https://github.com/madchicken/homebridge-comelit-hub) for more information and instructions.

bridge_url.title: Bridge URL (Optional)
bridge_url.Description: URL of the Comelit HUB or Icona Bridge on your private network. You can use the Comelit CLI tool to discover it or leave it empty for auto discovery

bridge_port.title: Bridge PORT (Optional)
bridge_port.Description: PORT of the Comelit HUB or Icona Bridge on your private network. Default is 64100.

icona_token.title: ICONA private token
icona_token.Description: Icona communication token. See instruction here https://github.com/madchicken/comelit-client/wiki/Get-your-user-token-for-ICONA-Bridge

opening_time.title: Time in sec spent by the gate/door to open

closing_time.title: Time in sec spent by the gate/door to close

opened_time.title: Time in sec the gate/door stays opened
